name: Honeydrop
description:
Welcome to Honeydrop!

Your hive has just been looted by a hungry (and sleepy) bear! You two are the lucky survivors and have to make it back to the hive. Work together to make it back home.

Controls:

Use the A and D keys to move left and right with Player 1. Use the W key to jump.
Use the left and right arrow keys to move left and right with Player 2. Use the up arrow to jump.
